# mkhelpers

<!-- badges: start -->
<!-- badges: end -->

These are my personal R helper tools.

## Installation

You can install the development version of mkhelpers from [GitHub](https://github.com/) with:

``` r
# install.packages("devtools")
devtools::install_github("MaxKman/mkhelpers")
```
